nodes.title: The Catherine
nodes.description: Inspired by stunning vintage style, The Catherine wraps glamorous 3-sided pave diamonds in a gorgeous milgrain finish. This intricate design work continues flawlessly around each pave stone and up the back of each prong, creating elegant intrigue from every angle. This half-pave design slips into smooth, polished perfection on the reverse side of the shank for effortless wear.

optionsFromMetafields.value: {"Center Stone Shape":["Round","Oval","Pear","Cushion","Elongated Cushion","Emerald","Radiant","Princess","Marquise","Asscher"],"Material":["14k White Gold","14k Yellow Gold","14k Rose Gold","18k White Gold","18k Yellow Gold","18k Rose Gold","Platinum"]}

nodes.title: Two-Tone
nodes.descriptionHtml: Create a unique look by mixing two metals. The head will be made in white gold and the band in your chosen metal.

nodes.title: Euro Shank
nodes.descriptionHtml: A modern squared base for comfortable, stylish wear.

nodes.title: Pave Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra sparkle to your setting with diamonds on the prongs.

nodes.title: 75% Around
nodes.descriptionHtml: Extend the diamonds on the band to go 75% around it.

nodes.title: All Around
nodes.descriptionHtml: Extend the diamonds on the band — all around.

nodes.title: 2.5mm Pave Band
nodes.descriptionHtml: Customize the band's width to your preference.

nodes.title: 6 Prongs (Round)
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra protection to the center stone with 6 prongs.

nodes.title: Pave Bridge
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra sparkle to your setting with diamonds on the bridge.

nodes.title: East West
nodes.descriptionHtml: Turn the center stone horizontally for a fresh, unique look.

nodes.title: Reverse Tapered Pave
nodes.descriptionHtml: A striking fusion of contemporary allure and bold design, with intricately set diamonds along a widening band.

nodes.title: Tapered Pave
nodes.descriptionHtml: Delicately set diamonds along a gracefully narrowing band.

nodes.title: The Lucia
nodes.description: Elevate your love story with The Lucia. This breathtaking engagement ring features a half-band adorned with six radiant marquise diamonds, each one contributing to its dazzling sparkle. The stunning hidden halo adds a touch of intrigue, enhancing the brilliance of the center stone with every movement. The classic four-prong design not only ensures security but also allows for an unobstructed display of the ring’s unmatched beauty. Whether viewed from above or admired from the side, The Lucia captivates with its graceful charm and intense sparkle.

nodes.title: Low Profile
nodes.descriptionHtml: The center stone is set close to the band, offering a sleek and practical design. A straight wedding band won’t fit with the ring.

nodes.title: 6 Prongs (Round)
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra protection to the center stone with 6 prongs.

nodes.title: Remove Hidden Halo
nodes.descriptionHtml: Remove the feature of smaller diamonds underneath the center stone (The setting design won’t change).

nodes.title: East West
nodes.descriptionHtml: Turn the center stone horizontally for a fresh, unique look.

nodes.title: Compass
nodes.descriptionHtml: A compass prong setting has four prongs aligned with the cardinal directions, highlighting the stone's beauty.

nodes.title: Bezel
nodes.descriptionHtml: A bezel setting surrounds the stone with a metal rim, providing a secure and modern look.

nodes.title: The Patricia
nodes.description: Discover The Patricia, an exquisite hidden halo style engagement ring. This unique feature encircles the main stone, enhancing its brilliance. An alternating combination of baguette and round cut diamonds adorns half of the band. These diamonds are expertly set in shared prongs, maximizing their visibility and sparkle. The seamless blend of different diamond shapes creates a harmonious and visually stunning effect.

nodes.title: The Rachel
nodes.description: Hypnotizing, at first sight, The Rachel 3D pave-set engagement ring is the ultimate in opulence and luxury. Showcasing a cathedral pave setting with micro bridge accents, it has immense shimmer and sparkle. The elevated ring head means you can stack the Rachel with other bands and eternity rings.

nodes.title: The Hailey
nodes.description: The Hailey has an elevated and timeless appeal. Clean, understated lines evoke a feeling of modern elegance, while the stunning flash from its six diamond baguettes adds a cool and sophisticated feel. A hidden halo incorporates glittering brilliance with its pave diamonds shining from every angle. The engagement ring is classic and contemporary. Brilliant and step-cut stones combine to make this piece uniquely suited to elevate the look of any center stone.

nodes.title: The Monica
nodes.description: The Monica is a true masterpiece that combines sleek refinement with icy sparkle. The centerpiece is a magnificent diamond that sparkles from every angle, surrounded by a glittering hidden halo that adds extra brilliance to the already stunning stone. The slender band is adorned with channel set baguette diamonds that perfectly complement the center stone. With its classic elegance and modern sophistication, The Monica engagement ring is the perfect way to celebrate your love story.

nodes.title: The Adelle
nodes.description: The Adelle flawlessly combines the timeless beauty of a diamond eternity band with the brilliance of an engagement ring. Its scalloped pave diamonds, set three-quarters around the band, strike the perfect balance between comfort, durability, and dazzling shine. Adding to its allure, a hidden halo offers a breathtaking side view, making The Adelle a stunning choice for those who crave classic elegance with a touch of modern sophistication.

nodes.title: The Kylie
nodes.description: The Kylie is the definition of radiance. This halo engagement ring is completely encrusted with microdiamonds—on the band, the bridge, and all around the halo—for all-over sparkle that stuns from every angle. Its elevated head adds to the drama while also making it effortlessly stackable with wedding and eternity bands. Bold, glamorous, and impossible to miss, The Kylie is made for the spotlight.
